tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ParentTeacherCommunication (
    parent_id INT,
    teacher_id INT,
    communication_date DATE,
    communication_method VARCHAR(50),
    communication_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Communication ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    parent_id INT NOT NULL, 
    teacher_id INT NOT NULL, 
    student_id INT NOT NULL, 
    message TEXT NOT NULL, 
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Parent (parent_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  parent_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
  phone_number VARCHAR(20) UNIQUE
)

CREATE TABLE Teacher (teacher_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  teacher_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
  phone_number VARCHAR(20) UNIQUE
)

CREATE TABLE Student (student_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  student_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  grade VARCHAR(10),
  parent_id UUID REFERENCES Parent(parent_id)
)

CREATE TABLE CommunicationLog (log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  log_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  communication_type VARCHAR(20),
  communication_details TEXT,
  parent_id UUID REFERENCES Parent(parent_id),
  teacher_id UUID REFERENCES Teacher(teacher_id),
  student_id UUID REFERENCES Student(student_id)
)

CREATE TABLE InteractionFeedback (feedback_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  feedback_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  feedback_details TEXT,
  log_id UUID REFERENCES CommunicationLog(log_id),
  parent_id UUID REFERENCES Parent(parent_id),
  teacher_id UUID REFERENCES Teacher(teacher_id),
  student_id UUID REFERENCES Student(student_id)
)
